body.name: 55 inch Computer Desk with Adjustable Shelves, Gaming Desk with LED Lights & Power Outlets, Home Office Desk with Monitor Stand, Hooks & CPU Stand, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 29 mins
features: 【4 Power Outlets & 2 USB Ports】: Power strip attached to the game desk for easy access to charging devices. Whether you are working or gaming on the led computer desk, this pc desk will keep your phones or monitors full power via multiple tabletop charging spots

【LED Light Strips】: Customize vibrant cool vibes to fit your gaming or working rooms through the RF remote. The 20 adjustable colours, 22 dynamic modes of the gaming desk with led lights will fully satisfy different working or gaming scenes. Also great to be used as an office desk, study desk, writing desk, or gaming desk

【Monitor Stand & Storage Shelves】: 3-level adjustable shelf heights for installing. Install it as monitor stand to elevate lines of sight and maintain a healthy working posture; or as storage shelves to store various books, displaying decors... And more, the CPU stand under the office desk will arrange your host well

【Compuer Desk with Storage】: 19.7"D x 55.1"W desktop and storage shelves below accommodates various office essentials. The storage bag beside the writing desk can store various office items and the hooks can hold your headphones, they can also be interchanged for your convenience. Plus: Adjustable feet keep this study desk stable on any floor you want

【Solid Material & Robust Frame】: Using P2 particle board and metal frame, this corner gaming desk ensures durability and longevity, allowing the modern desk to withstand regular use in various settings such as study rooms, offices, or gaming room. Plus: All components are labelled, tools are provided and clear instruction are attached. Assembly is as easy as a pie

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, sleek, sturdy desk
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the ease of assembly and how good it looks with the LED lights. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Assemble & Plenty Of Storage Space
reviews.reviewText: I’m a collector who wanted a desk to use but to also have room to display some of my dolls, plushies, and figurines as well and this desk works perfectly! It’s also pretty easy to assemble. I’d definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid And Pleasant Desk :)
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, good materials and came with the correct spacing that I wanted. Although the assembly was a bit tricky because you need to have an eye for detail (some of the holes need to be exactly outwards or else you will have to dissasemble and re attach the correct way).Im glad all the parts needed came in the package, however, for the #7 & #5 pillars, 1 hole was not drilled in and left me installing only 1 bolt for the top pillar support that connects to the desk.Asides from that, intuitive, sleek looking and just what I wanted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 2nd update:Every day I love this desk even more. I’m considering getting another one and combining them into an L shaped desk because my other desk doesn’t measure up to this one. I normally don’t review a lot of things and even less give an update or post a video but this desk is worth it.Update:The LED works now! I have no idea what happened. I didn’t do anything to fix the issue but with a couple of days it now works. All the lights turn on. The desk is still awesome and I love it even more now with the working LED lights.Previous Review:I love the desk. It’s exactly as it looks like. They sent everything that would be needed to put it together, tools for the parts even a screwdriver. The only issue is that my LED lights don’t light up completely. Half of the bottom part of the strip just doesn’t work. I don’t see any damages or cuts on it, it just does not light up. But besides that I love it. I just wish the LED lights had worked because I wanted extra lighting in the nighttime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my son for homework and computer work and is awesome!!!! The instructions were clear and simple, the holes all lined up great, literally took 1 person MAYBE an hour. The lights are such a great add on especially with a remote! Very spacious. Got a cheap $40 computer chair from Walmart and fits great!And to top it off- our son loves it- and the hubs who put it together loved doing it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my tween. Put it together by myself in under an hour. Sturdy, great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Assembly is easy af
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Assembly took me about an hour by myself .. pretty simple stuff. Well worth the price for sure and fits perfectly in my space. Sturdy. Make sure u put the two outter pieces with the holes facing out, to attach pouch and hooks for headsets (you’ll know what I mean once you get there, friendly reminder) 😅 that’s pretty much all that I messed up on, other wise great product. Even looks nice, and my gamer chair pulls right up to it at perfect height. Built for style and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome desk for little gamers
reviews.reviewText: My son recieved this as a Christmas present or was pretty easy to put together. Perfect size and great storage for kids that love gaming.
